long_description: Perfect for sipping coffee around the campfire or hot soup after a long day on the trail, the lightweight Stanley eCycle Infinite Mug/Bowl set packs easily with your gear thanks to its nesting design. Set includes two 12 oz. mugs with 2 drink-thru lids; pieces nest together for easy packing or storing. Built with eCycle(R), Stanley's proprietary blend of BPA-free recycled and recyclable polypropylene. Stanley eCycle Infinite Mug/Bowl set is dishwasher- and microwave-safe; volume markings let the mugs double as measuring cups.
short_description: Perfect for sipping coffee around the campfire or hot soup after a long day on the trail, the lightweight Stanley eCycle Infinite Mug/Bowl set packs easily with your gear thanks to its nesting design.
